Room.Name: Necropolis Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking along Necropolis Avenue, west of Danielle's Mage Emporium.
Room.LongDescription: There is a large complex on the west side of the road that appears to be fairly popular. You can hear a lot of cheering and otherwise drunken laughter coming from the other side of the building. The complex has an entrance on the south side of the building off of Hillborough Way. On the east is Danielle's Mystic Mage Emporium, almost every known potion may be purchased.
